mapper.insert: insert into dang_board(board_no, member_no, dang_no, member_nick, board_content, board_like, board_writedate, board_updatedate, board_state) values(#{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{dangNo},#{memberNick}, #{boardContent}, #{boardLike}, #{boardWriteDate}, #{boardUpdateDate}, #{boardState})
mapper.select: select count(*) from dang_board where member_no=#{memberNo}
